inclusion.criterion: Hemoglobin ≥ 11.0 g/dL for African American subjects or ≥ 11.5 g/dL for non-African American subjects
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Hemoglobin less than 12 g/dl and hematocrit less than 36%
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has myasthenia gravis, class IIa. She takes pyridostigmine 60 mg three times a day.
